XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for Report Builder Totara module

TABLE.NAME: report_builder
TABLE.COMMENT: Each report has an entry here

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the table

FIELD.NAME: fullname
FIELD.COMMENT: Title of report, displayed on page and used to refer to a report instance

FIELD.NAME: shortname
FIELD.COMMENT: Unique shortname used internally as a unique way of identifying a report

FIELD.NAME: source
FIELD.COMMENT: Data source on which the report is based

FIELD.NAME: hidden
FIELD.COMMENT: If set to 1, report not shown on My Reports page but still accessible at URL

FIELD.NAME: cache
FIELD.COMMENT: If set to 1, report will be generated once per scheduled period and cached. Users will see only cached results

FIELD.NAME: accessmode
FIELD.COMMENT: Controls how access to the report is determined

FIELD.NAME: contentmode
FIELD.COMMENT: Controls how the content of the report is determined

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: Description of the report

FIELD.NAME: recordsperpage
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of records to show on a single page of results for this report

FIELD.NAME: defaultsortcolumn
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the column (type_value) to use to initially sort the report

FIELD.NAME: defaultsortorder
FIELD.COMMENT: Integer representing the direction that default sorting should be done

FIELD.NAME: embedded
FIELD.COMMENT: Indicates whether the report is an embedded report. Set to 1 for embedded, 0 otherwise.

FIELD.NAME: initialdisplay
FIELD.COMMENT: Indicated whether to wait for filters to be applied before generating the report

FIELD.NAME: toolbarsearch
FIELD.COMMENT: Indicates if toolbarsearch should be enabled

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Updated when the report, column or setting changes

INDEX.NAME: shortname
INDEX.COMMENT: Ensure that shortname remains a unique identifier

TABLE.NAME: report_builder_columns
TABLE.COMMENT: Defines columns belonging to each report

FIELD.NAME: reportid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the report this column belongs to

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: Type of column, used with value to identify the column option

FIELD.NAME: value
FIELD.COMMENT: Value of column, used with type to identify the column option

FIELD.NAME: transform
FIELD.COMMENT: Column transform function, null means none

FIELD.NAME: aggregate
FIELD.COMMENT: Aggregation type, null means none

FIELD.NAME: heading
FIELD.COMMENT: Visible heading describing the column to report users

FIELD.NAME: sortorder
FIELD.COMMENT: Determines the order that the columns appear in the report

FIELD.NAME: hidden
FIELD.COMMENT: If non zero then column is hidden from users by default

FIELD.NAME: customheading
FIELD.COMMENT: Indicates whether the user has customised a heading or if they are still using the default column heading value

FIELD.NAME: reportid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the report this graph belongs to

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: Type of graph, empty means none

FIELD.NAME: stacked
FIELD.COMMENT: Stack data series? Only some types support this.

FIELD.NAME: maxrecords
FIELD.COMMENT: Maximum of records used in a graph?

FIELD.NAME: category
FIELD.COMMENT: none,reversed or name of one column

FIELD.NAME: legend
FIELD.COMMENT: name of one column, used when axis are reversed

FIELD.NAME: series
FIELD.COMMENT: Series info encoded in json format

FIELD.NAME: settings
FIELD.COMMENT: Custom graph configuration in INI format

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: udpated when graph changes

TABLE.NAME: report_builder_filters
TABLE.COMMENT: Defines filters belonging to each report

FIELD.NAME: reportid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the report this column belongs to

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: Type of filter, used with value to identify the filter option

FIELD.NAME: value
FIELD.COMMENT: Value of filter, used with type to identify the filter option

FIELD.NAME: sortorder
FIELD.COMMENT: Determines the order that the filters appear in the report

FIELD.NAME: advanced
FIELD.COMMENT: If none zero then the filter is an advanced option

FIELD.NAME: filtername
FIELD.COMMENT: Visible name describing the filter to report users

FIELD.NAME: customname
FIELD.COMMENT: Indicates whether the user has customised a name or if they are still using the default filter name value

FIELD.NAME: region
FIELD.COMMENT: Indicates whether filter appears at the top or in the sidebar

TABLE.NAME: report_builder_search_cols
TABLE.COMMENT: Defines search columns belonging to each report

FIELD.NAME: reportid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the report the setting belongs to

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: Component of report builder that the setting is for

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the setting

FIELD.NAME: value
FIELD.COMMENT: Value of the setting

KEY.NAME: reportid-type-name
KEY.COMMENT: Each setting should only be set once

FIELD.NAME: reportid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the report this saved search belongs to

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: User who saved the search

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: A name describing the saved search

FIELD.NAME: search
FIELD.COMMENT: Serialized data containing the search details

FIELD.NAME: ispublic
FIELD.COMMENT: If none zero, the saved search is visible to all users, not just the creator

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: udpated when saved changes

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the activity group

FIELD.NAME: preproc
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the pre-processor used by this activity group

FIELD.NAME: baseitem
FIELD.COMMENT: Unique reference to the base item for this activity group

FIELD.NAME: assigntype
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the method for assigning activities to this group

FIELD.NAME: assignvalue
FIELD.COMMENT: Value used by some assign types to store information about assignments

FIELD.NAME: groupid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the group to assign an activity to

FIELD.NAME: itemid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the item to assign to the group

KEY.NAME: groupid-itemid
KEY.COMMENT: Prevent an item being assigned to the same group multiple times

TABLE.NAME: report_builder_preproc_track
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores which items have been preprocessed and when, to avoid processing unchanged items

FIELD.NAME: groupid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the group the item belongs to

FIELD.NAME: itemid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the item that has been processed

FIELD.NAME: lastchecked
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the item was last checked

FIELD.NAME: disabled
FIELD.COMMENT: If none zero, the item is disabled, so will no longer be processed. This is used to prevent repeatedly attempting to process items which have a problem.

KEY.NAME: groupid-itemid
KEY.COMMENT: To prevent an item being tracked twice within the same group

TABLE.NAME: report_builder_cache
TABLE.COMMENT: Storing details of scheduled reports caching

FIELD.NAME: cachetable
FIELD.COMMENT: Table name with cached data for report
